about_the_game:
Hogbunny Gnart Tigermoth is a trusted servant at the seat of knowledge in The House of the Owl Tide. Ideally Gnart wants like to stroll the archives, read old books by a long-lasting candle and safely uncover old myths. Somehow, though, he has the knack for getting himself flung out into the sprawling and dangerous world of Umbra, out into adventure.

Available in English only. The comic book can be accessed by selecting the title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.
detailed_description:
Hogbunny Gnart Tigermoth is a trusted servant at the seat of knowledge in The House of the Owl Tide. Ideally Gnart wants like to stroll the archives, read old books by a long-lasting candle and safely uncover old myths. Somehow, though, he has the knack for getting himself flung out into the sprawling and dangerous world of Umbra, out into adventure.

Available in English only. The comic book can be accessed by selecting the title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 1GB of memory
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 2GB of memory
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
